5608 /*
5609 @api begin
5610 sirius_set_rg_values:
5611  doc: Set the values of the function on the regular grid.
5612  arguments:
5613  handler:
5614  type: void*
5615  attr: in, required
5616  doc: DFT ground state handler.
5617  label:
5618  type: string
5619  attr: in, required
5620  doc: Label of the function.
5621  grid_dims:
5622  type: int
5623  attr: in, required
5624  doc: Dimensions of the FFT grid.
5625  local_box_origin:
5626  type: int
5627  attr: in, required
5628  doc: Coordinates of the local box origin for each MPI rank
5629  local_box_size:
5630  type: int
5631  attr: in, required
5632  doc: Dimensions of the local box for each MPI rank.
5633  fcomm:
5634  type: int
5635  attr: in, required
5636  doc: Fortran communicator used to partition FFT grid into local boxes.
5637  values:
5638  type: double
5639  attr: in, required
5640  doc: Values of the function (local buffer for each MPI rank).
5641  transform_to_pw:
5642  type: bool
5643  attr: in, optional
5644  doc: If true, transform function to PW domain.
5645 @api end
5646 */
5647 void sirius_set_rg_values(void* const* handler__,
5648  char const* label__,
5649  int const* grid_dims__,
5650  int const* local_box_origin__,
5651  int const* local_box_size__,
5652  int const* fcomm__,
5653  double const* values__,
5654  bool const* transform_to_pw__)
5655 {
5656  PROFILE("sirius_api::sirius_set_rg_values");
5657 
5658  auto& gs = get_gs(handler__);
5659 
5660  std::string label(label__);
5661 
5662  for (int x: {0, 1, 2}) {
5663  if (grid_dims__[x] != gs.ctx().fft_grid()[x]) {
5664  std::stringstream s;
5665  s << "wrong FFT grid size\n"
5666  " SIRIUS internal: " << gs.ctx().fft_grid()[0] << " " << gs.ctx().fft_grid()[1] << " "
5667  << gs.ctx().fft_grid()[2] << "\n"
5668  " host code: " << grid_dims__[0] << " " << grid_dims__[1] << " " << grid_dims__[2];
5669  TERMINATE(s.str());
5670  }
5671  }
5672 
5673  std::map<std::string, sirius::Smooth_periodic_function<double>*> func = {
5674  {"rho", &gs.density().rho()},
5675  {"magz", &gs.density().magnetization(0)},
5676  {"magx", &gs.density().magnetization(1)},
5677  {"magy", &gs.density().magnetization(2)},
5678  {"veff", &gs.potential().effective_potential()},
5679  {"bz", &gs.potential().effective_magnetic_field(0)},
5680  {"bx", &gs.potential().effective_magnetic_field(1)},
5681  {"by", &gs.potential().effective_magnetic_field(2)},
5682  {"vxc", &gs.potential().xc_potential()},
5683  };
5684 
5685  try {
5686  auto& f = func.at(label);
5687 
5688  auto& comm = Communicator::map_fcomm(*fcomm__);
5689 
5690  mdarray<int, 2> local_box_size(const_cast<int*>(local_box_size__), 3, comm.size());
5691  mdarray<int, 2> local_box_origin(const_cast<int*>(local_box_origin__), 3, comm.size());
5692 
5693  for (int rank = 0; rank < comm.size(); rank++) {
5694  /* dimensions of this rank's local box */
5695  int nx = local_box_size(0, rank);
5696  int ny = local_box_size(1, rank);
5697  int nz = local_box_size(2, rank);
5698 
5699  mdarray<double, 3> buf(nx, ny, nz);
5700  /* if this is that rank's turn to broadcast */
5701  if (comm.rank() == rank) {
5702  /* copy values to buf */
5703  std::copy(values__, values__ + nx * ny * nz, &buf[0]);
5704  }
5705  /* send a copy of local box to all ranks */
5706  comm.bcast(&buf[0], nx * ny * nz, rank);
5707 
5708  for (int iz = 0; iz < nz; iz++) {
5709  /* global z coordinate inside FFT box */
5710  int z = local_box_origin(2, rank) + iz - 1; /* Fortran counts from 1 */
5711  /* each rank on SIRIUS side, for which this condition is fulfilled copies data from the local box */
5712  if (z >= gs.ctx().spfft().local_z_offset() && z < gs.ctx().spfft().local_z_offset() + gs.ctx().spfft().local_z_length()) {
5713  /* make z local for SIRIUS FFT partitioning */
5714  z -= gs.ctx().spfft().local_z_offset();
5715  for (int iy = 0; iy < ny; iy++) {
5716  /* global y coordinate inside FFT box */
5717  int y = local_box_origin(1, rank) + iy - 1; /* Fortran counts from 1 */
5718  for (int ix = 0; ix < nx; ix++) {
5719  /* global x coordinate inside FFT box */
5720  int x = local_box_origin(0, rank) + ix - 1; /* Fortran counts from 1 */
5721  f->f_rg(gs.ctx().fft_grid().index_by_coord(x, y, z)) = buf(ix, iy, iz);
5722  }
5723  }
5724  }
5725  }
5726  } /* loop over ranks */
5727  if (transform_to_pw__ && *transform_to_pw__) {
5728  f->fft_transform(-1);
5729  }
5730  } catch(...) {
5731  TERMINATE("wrong label");
5732  }
5733 }
5734 
5735 /*
5736 @api begin
5737 sirius_get_rg_values:
5738  doc: Get the values of the function on the regular grid.
5739  arguments:
5740  handler:
5741  type: void*
5742  attr: in, required
5743  doc: DFT ground state handler.
5744  label:
5745  type: string
5746  attr: in, required
5747  doc: Label of the function.
5748  grid_dims:
5749  type: int
5750  attr: in, required
5751  doc: Dimensions of the FFT grid.
5752  local_box_origin:
5753  type: int
5754  attr: in, required
5755  doc: Coordinates of the local box origin for each MPI rank
5756  local_box_size:
5757  type: int
5758  attr: in, required
5759  doc: Dimensions of the local box for each MPI rank.
5760  fcomm:
5761  type: int
5762  attr: in, required
5763  doc: Fortran communicator used to partition FFT grid into local boxes.
5764  values:
5765  type: double
5766  attr: out, required
5767  doc: Values of the function (local buffer for each MPI rank).
5768  transform_to_rg:
5769  type: bool
5770  attr: in, optional
5771  doc: If true, transform function to regular grid before fetching the values.
5772 @api end
5773 */
5774 void sirius_get_rg_values(void* const* handler__,
5775  char const* label__,
5776  int const* grid_dims__,
5777  int const* local_box_origin__,
5778  int const* local_box_size__,
5779  int const* fcomm__,
5780  double* values__,
5781  bool const* transform_to_rg__)
5782 {
5783  PROFILE("sirius_api::sirius_get_rg_values");
5784 
5785  auto& gs = get_gs(handler__);
5786 
5787  std::string label(label__);
5788 
5789  for (int x: {0, 1, 2}) {
5790  if (grid_dims__[x] != gs.ctx().fft_grid()[x]) {
5791  TERMINATE("wrong FFT grid size");
5792  }
5793  }
5794 
5795  std::map<std::string, sirius::Smooth_periodic_function<double>*> func = {
5796  {"rho", &gs.density().rho()},
5797  {"magz", &gs.density().magnetization(0)},
5798  {"magx", &gs.density().magnetization(1)},
5799  {"magy", &gs.density().magnetization(2)},
5800  {"veff", &gs.potential().effective_potential()},
5801  {"bz", &gs.potential().effective_magnetic_field(0)},
5802  {"bx", &gs.potential().effective_magnetic_field(1)},
5803  {"by", &gs.potential().effective_magnetic_field(2)},
5804  {"vxc", &gs.potential().xc_potential()},
5805  };
5806 
5807  try {
5808  auto& f = func.at(label);
5809 
5810  auto& comm = Communicator::map_fcomm(*fcomm__);
5811 
5812  if (transform_to_rg__ && *transform_to_rg__) {
5813  f->fft_transform(1);
5814  }
5815 
5816  auto& fft_comm = gs.ctx().comm_fft();
5817  auto spl_z = split_fft_z(gs.ctx().fft_grid()[2], fft_comm);
5818 
5819  mdarray<int, 2> local_box_size(const_cast<int*>(local_box_size__), 3, comm.size());
5820  mdarray<int, 2> local_box_origin(const_cast<int*>(local_box_origin__), 3, comm.size());
5821 
5822  for (int rank = 0; rank < fft_comm.size(); rank++) {
5823  /* slab of FFT grid for a given rank */
5824  mdarray<double, 3> buf(f->spfft().dim_x(), f->spfft().dim_y(), spl_z.local_size(rank));
5825  if (rank == fft_comm.rank()) {
5826  std::copy(&f->f_rg(0), &f->f_rg(0) + f->spfft().local_slice_size(), &buf[0]);
5827  }
5828  fft_comm.bcast(&buf[0], static_cast<int>(buf.size()), rank);
5829 
5830  /* ranks on the F90 side */
5831  int r = comm.rank();
5832 
5833  /* dimensions of this rank's local box */
5834  int nx = local_box_size(0, r);
5835  int ny = local_box_size(1, r);
5836  int nz = local_box_size(2, r);
5837  mdarray<double, 3> values(values__, nx, ny, nz);
5838 
5839  for (int iz = 0; iz < nz; iz++) {
5840  /* global z coordinate inside FFT box */
5841  int z = local_box_origin(2, r) + iz - 1; /* Fortran counts from 1 */
5842  if (z >= spl_z.global_offset(rank) && z < spl_z.global_offset(rank) + spl_z.local_size(rank)) {
5843  /* make z local for SIRIUS FFT partitioning */
5844  z -= spl_z.global_offset(rank);
5845  for (int iy = 0; iy < ny; iy++) {
5846  /* global y coordinate inside FFT box */
5847  int y = local_box_origin(1, r) + iy - 1; /* Fortran counts from 1 */
5848  for (int ix = 0; ix < nx; ix++) {
5849  /* global x coordinate inside FFT box */
5850  int x = local_box_origin(0, r) + ix - 1; /* Fortran counts from 1 */
5851  values(ix, iy, iz) = buf(x, y, z);
5852  }
5853  }
5854  }
5855  }
5856  } /* loop over ranks */
5857  } catch(...) {
5858  TERMINATE("wrong label");
5859  }
5860 }
5861 
5862 
5863 /*
5864 @api begin
5865 sirius_get_total_magnetization:
5866  doc: Get the total magnetization of the system.
5867  arguments:
5868  handler:
5869  type: void*
5870  attr: in, required
5871  doc: DFT ground state handler.
5872  mag:
5873  type: double
5874  attr: out, required
5875  doc: 3D magnetization vector (x,y,z components).
5876 @api end
5877 */
5878 void sirius_get_total_magnetization(void* const* handler__,
5879  double* mag__)
5880 {
5881  auto& gs = get_gs(handler__);
5882 
5883  mdarray<double, 1> total_mag(mag__, 3);
5884  total_mag.zero();
5885  for (int j = 0; j < gs.ctx().num_mag_dims(); j++) {
5886  auto result = gs.density().magnetization(j).integrate();
5887  total_mag[j] = std::get<0>(result);
5888  }
5889  if (gs.ctx().num_mag_dims() == 3) {
5890  /* swap z and x and change order from z,x,y to x,z,y */
5891  std::swap(total_mag[0], total_mag[1]);
5892  /* swap z and y and change order x,z,y to x,y,z */
5893  std::swap(total_mag[1], total_mag[2]);
5894  }
5895 }

5928 /*
5929 @api begin
5930 sirius_get_kpoint_properties:
5931  doc: Get the kpoint properties
5932  arguments:
5933  handler:
5934  type: void*
5935  attr: in, required
5936  doc: Kpoint set handler
5937  ik:
5938  type: int
5939  attr: in, required
5940  doc: Index of the kpoint
5941  weight:
5942  type: double
5943  attr: out, required
5944  doc: Weight of the kpoint
5945  coordinates:
5946  type: double
5947  attr: out, optional
5948  doc: Coordinates of the kpoint
5949  error_code:
5950  type: int
5951  attr: out, optional
5952  doc: Error code.
5953 @api end
5954 */
5955 void sirius_get_kpoint_properties(void* const* handler__,
5956  int const* ik__, // TODO assume Fortran index (starting from 1)
5957  double *weight__,
5958  double *coordinates__,
5959  int *error_code__)
5960 {
5961  call_sirius([&]()
5962  {
5963  auto& ks = get_ks(handler__);
5964  int ik = *ik__;
5965  *weight__ = ks[ik]->weight();
5966 
5967  if (coordinates__) {
5968  coordinates__[0] = ks[ik]->vk()[0];
5969  coordinates__[1] = ks[ik]->vk()[1];
5970  coordinates__[2] = ks[ik]->vk()[2];
5971  }
5972  }, error_code__);

5975 /*
5976 @api begin
5977 sirius_get_matching_coefficients:
5978  doc: Get matching coefficients for all atoms.
5979  full_doc: Warning! Generation of matching coefficients for all atoms has a large memory footprint. Use it with caution.
5980  arguments:
5981  handler:
5982  type: void*
5983  attr: in, required
5984  doc: K-point set handler.
5985  ik:
5986  type: int
5987  attr: in, required
5988  doc: Index of k-point.
5989  alm:
5990  type: complex
5991  attr: out, required
5992  doc: Matching coefficients.
5993  error_code:
5994  type: int
5995  attr: out, optional
5996  doc: Error code.
5997 @api end
5998 */
5999 void sirius_get_matching_coefficients(void* const* handler__, int const* ik__, std::complex<double>* alm__,
6000  int* error_code__)
6001 {
6002  call_sirius([&]()
6003  {
6004  auto& ks = get_ks(handler__);
6005  auto& sctx = ks.ctx();
6006 
6007  auto& uc = sctx.unit_cell();
6008  auto& kp = *ks[*ik__ - 1];
6009  auto& gk = kp.gkvec();
6010 
6011  std::vector<int> igk(gk.num_gvec());
6012  std::iota(igk.begin(), igk.end(), 0);
6013 
6014  sddk::mdarray<std::complex<double>, 3> alm(alm__, gk.num_gvec(), uc.max_mt_aw_basis_size(), uc.num_atoms());
6015  sirius::Matching_coefficients Alm(uc, sctx.lmax_apw(), gk.num_gvec(), igk, gk);
6016  for (int ia = 0; ia < uc.num_atoms(); ia++) {
6017  sddk::mdarray<std::complex<double>, 2> alm_tmp(&alm(0, 0, ia), gk.num_gvec(), uc.max_mt_aw_basis_size());
6018  Alm.generate<false>(uc.atom(ia), alm_tmp);
6019  }
6020  }, error_code__);
6021 }

6023 /*
6024 @api begin
6025 sirius_set_callback_function:
6026  doc: Set callback function to compute various radial integrals.
6027  arguments:
6028  handler:
6029  type: void*
6030  attr: in, required
6031  doc: Simulation context handler.
6032  label:
6033  type: string
6034  attr: in, required
6035  doc: Lable of the callback function.
6036  fptr:
6037  type: func
6038  attr: in, required
6039  doc: Pointer to callback function.
6040  error_code:
6041  type: int
6042  attr: out, optional
6043  doc: Error code.
6044 @api end
6045 */
6046 void sirius_set_callback_function(void* const* handler__, char const* label__, void(*fptr__)(), int* error_code__)
6047 {
6048  call_sirius([&]()
6049  {
6050  auto label = std::string(label__);
6051  std::transform(label.begin(), label.end(), label.begin(), ::tolower);
6052  auto& sim_ctx = get_sim_ctx(handler__);
6053  if (label == "beta_ri") {
6054  sim_ctx.beta_ri_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(int, double, double*, int)>(fptr__));
6055  } else if (label == "beta_ri_djl") {
6056  sim_ctx.beta_ri_djl_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(int, double, double*, int)>(fptr__));
6057  } else if (label == "aug_ri") {
6058  sim_ctx.aug_ri_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(int, double, double*, int, int)>(fptr__));
6059  } else if (label == "aug_ri_djl") {
6060  sim_ctx.aug_ri_djl_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(int, double, double*, int, int)>(fptr__));
6061  } else if (label == "vloc_ri") {
6062  sim_ctx.vloc_ri_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(int, int, double*, double*)>(fptr__));
6063  } else if (label == "vloc_ri_djl") {
6064  sim_ctx.vloc_ri_djl_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(int, int, double*, double*)>(fptr__));
6065  } else if (label == "rhoc_ri") {
6066  sim_ctx.rhoc_ri_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(int, int, double*, double*)>(fptr__));
6067  } else if (label == "rhoc_ri_djl") {
6068  sim_ctx.rhoc_ri_djl_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(int, int, double*, double*)>(fptr__));
6069  } else if (label == "band_occ") {
6070  sim_ctx.band_occ_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(void)>(fptr__));
6071  } else if (label == "veff") {
6072  sim_ctx.veff_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(void)>(fptr__));
6073  } else if (label == "ps_rho_ri") {
6074  sim_ctx.ps_rho_ri_callback(reinterpret_cast<void(*)(int, int, double*, double*)>(fptr__));
6075  } else {
6076  std::stringstream s;
6077  s << "Wrong label of the callback function: " << label;
6078  throw std::runtime_error(s.str());
6079  }
6080  }, error_code__);
6081 }

6083 /*
6084 @api begin
6085 sirius_nlcg:
6086  doc: Robust wave function optimizer
6087  arguments:
6088  handler:
6089  type: void*
6090  attr: in, required
6091  doc: Ground state handler
6092  ks_handler:
6093  type: void*
6094  attr: in, required
6095  doc: point set handler
6096 @api end
6097 */
6098 
6099 void sirius_nlcg(void* const* handler__,
6100  void* const* ks_handler__)
6101 {
6102 #ifdef SIRIUS_NLCGLIB
6103  // call nlcg solver
6104  auto& gs = get_gs(handler__);
6105  auto& potential = gs.potential();
6106  auto& density = gs.density();
6107 
6108  auto& kset = get_ks(ks_handler__);
6109  auto& ctx = kset.ctx();
6110 
6111  auto nlcg_params = ctx.nlcg_input();
6112  double temp = nlcg_params.T_;
6113  double tol = nlcg_params.tol_;
6114  double kappa = nlcg_params.kappa_;
6115  double tau = nlcg_params.tau_;
6116  int maxiter = nlcg_params.maxiter_;
6117  int restart = nlcg_params.restart_;
6118  std::string smear = nlcg_params.smearing_;
6119  std::string pu = nlcg_params.processing_unit_;
6120 
6121  nlcglib::smearing_type smearing;
6122  if (smear.compare("FD") == 0) {
6123  smearing = nlcglib::smearing_type::FERMI_DIRAC;
6124  } else if (smear.compare("GS") == 0) {
6125  smearing = nlcglib::smearing_type::GAUSSIAN_SPLINE;
6126  } else {
6127  throw std::runtime_error("invalid smearing type given");
6128  }
6129 
6130  sirius::Energy energy(kset, density, potential);
6131  if (is_device_memory(ctx.preferred_memory_t())) {
6132  if (pu.empty() || pu.compare("gpu") == 0) {
6133  nlcglib::nlcg_mvp2_device(energy, smearing, temp, tol, kappa, tau, maxiter, restart);
6134  } else if (pu.compare("cpu") == 0) {
6135  nlcglib::nlcg_mvp2_device_cpu(energy, smearing, temp, tol, kappa, tau, maxiter, restart);
6136  } else {
6137  throw std::runtime_error("invalid processing unit for nlcg given: " + pu);
6138  }
6139  } else {
6140  if (pu.empty() || pu.compare("gpu") == 0) {
6141  nlcglib::nlcg_mvp2_cpu(energy, smearing, temp, tol, kappa, tau, maxiter, restart);
6142  } else if (pu.compare("cpu") == 0) {
6143  nlcglib::nlcg_mvp2_cpu_device(energy, smearing, temp, tol, kappa, tau, maxiter, restart);
6144  } else {
6145  throw std::runtime_error("invalid processing unit for nlcg given: " + pu);
6146  }
6147  }
6148 
6149 #else
6150  throw std::runtime_error("SIRIUS was not compiled with NLCG option.");
6151 #endif
6152 }
6153 
6154 /*
6155 @api begin
6156 sirius_nlcg_params:
6157  doc: Robust wave function optimizer
6158  arguments:
6159  handler:
6160  type: void*
6161  attr: in, required
6162  doc: Ground state handler
6163  ks_handler:
6164  type: void*
6165  attr: in, required
6166  doc: point set handler
6167  temp:
6168  type: double
6169  attr: in, required
6170  doc: Temperature in Kelvin
6171  smearing:
6172  type: string
6173  attr: in, required
6174  doc: smearing label
6175  kappa:
6176  type: double
6177  attr: in, required
6178  doc: pseudo-Hamiltonian scalar preconditioner
6179  tau:
6180  type: double
6181  attr: in, required
6182  doc: backtracking search reduction parameter
6183  tol:
6184  type: double
6185  attr: in, required
6186  doc: CG tolerance
6187  maxiter:
6188  type: int
6189  attr: in, required
6190  doc: CG maxiter
6191  restart:
6192  type: int
6193  attr: in, required
6194  doc: CG restart
6195  processing_unit:
6196  type: string
6197  attr: in, required
6198  doc: processing_unit = ["cpu"|"gpu"|"none"]
6199 @api end
6200 */
6201 
6202 void sirius_nlcg_params(void* const* handler__,
6203  void* const* ks_handler__,
6204  double const* temp__,
6205  char const* smearing__,
6206  double const* kappa__,
6207  double const* tau__,
6208  double const* tol__,
6209  int const* maxiter__,
6210  int const* restart__,
6211  char const* processing_unit__)
6212 {
6213 #ifdef SIRIUS_NLCGLIB
6214  // call nlcg solver
6215  auto& gs = get_gs(handler__);
6216  auto& potential = gs.potential();
6217  auto& density = gs.density();
6218 
6219  auto& kset = get_ks(ks_handler__);
6220  auto& ctx = kset.ctx();
6221 
6222  double temp = *temp__;
6223  double kappa = *kappa__;
6224  double tau = *tau__;
6225  double tol = *tol__;
6226  int maxiter = *maxiter__;
6227  int restart = *restart__;
6228 
6229  std::string smear(smearing__);
6230  std::string pu(processing_unit__);
6231 
6232  nlcglib::smearing_type smearing_t;
6233  if (smear.compare("FD") == 0) {
6234  smearing_t = nlcglib::smearing_type::FERMI_DIRAC;
6235  } else if (smear.compare("GS") == 0) {
6236  smearing_t = nlcglib::smearing_type::GAUSSIAN_SPLINE;
6237  } else {
6238  throw std::runtime_error("invalid smearing type given");
6239  }
6240 
6241  if(pu.compare("none") == 0) {
6242  // use same processing unit as SIRIUS
6243  pu = ctx.control().processing_unit_;
6244  }
6245 
6246  nlcglib::nlcg_info info;
6247 
6248  sirius::Energy energy(kset, density, potential);
6249  if (is_device_memory(ctx.preferred_memory_t())) {
6250  if (pu.empty() || pu.compare("gpu") == 0) {
6251  info = nlcglib::nlcg_mvp2_device(energy, smearing_t, temp, tol, kappa, tau, maxiter, restart);
6252  } else if (pu.compare("cpu") == 0) {
6253  info = nlcglib::nlcg_mvp2_device_cpu(energy, smearing_t, temp, tol, kappa, tau, maxiter, restart);
6254  } else {
6255  throw std::runtime_error("invalid processing unit for nlcg given: " + pu);
6256  }
6257  } else {
6258  if (pu.empty() || pu.compare("cpu") == 0) {
6259  info = nlcglib::nlcg_mvp2_cpu(energy, smearing_t, temp, tol, kappa, tau, maxiter, restart);
6260  } else if (pu.compare("gpu") == 0) {
6261  info = nlcglib::nlcg_mvp2_cpu_device(energy, smearing_t, temp, tol, kappa, tau, maxiter, restart);
6262  } else {
6263  throw std::runtime_error("invalid processing unit for nlcg given: " + pu);
6264  }
6265  }
6266 
6267 #else
6268  throw std::runtime_error("SIRIUS was not compiled with NLCG option.");
6269 #endif
6270 }
